definitions: in a confident and courageous way; showing a willingness to take risks

examples.text: you will have our support as long as you fight boldly against corruption
we urge the educational community to act boldly

definitions: in a manner that is so confident as to be impudent or presumptuous

examples.text: thieves who boldly robbed the wounded and helpless passengers

shortDefinitions: so confident as to be impudent or presumptuous

definitions: in a way that is characterized by having a strong, vivid, or clear appearance

examples.text: I grabbed a couple of boldly patterned fabric samples

shortDefinitions: in way characterized by having strong, vivid, or clear appearance
